chapter.title: Server Management
chapter.para: Teiid Designer is a design-time tool that allows setting up and testing deployable VDB artifacts. In order to deploy and test these VDB's a running application server is required that contains an installed Teiid submodule. This section describes how to set up, connect and maintain your servers and describes the various aspects of what features in Teiid Designer are enabled by this connection and how you can leverage these capabilities.
